data.title: ER Season 12 Streaming: Watch & Stream Online via Hulu & HBO Max
data.meta_description: Wondering where to watch ER Season 12? Here's how you can stream ER Season 12 online and catch the episodes.
data.meta_site_name: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
data.text:
If you’re addicted to medical drama TV series, ER Season 12 will be your choice of poison. Created by author and physician Michael Crichton, the show focuses on the physicians and staff working in Cook County General Hospital’s emergency room and the critical issues they face daily. The hospital setting mentioned in the series is a play on the real Cook County Hospital in Chicago. It is the second longest-running primetime medical drama after Grey’s Anatomy in American TV history.

Here’s how you can watch and stream ER Season 12 via streaming services such as Hulu & HBO Max.

Is ER Season 12 available to watch via streaming?

Yes, ER Season 12 is available to watch via streaming on Hulu & HBO Max.

First aired in September 2005, the medical drama series chronicles how the relationship between Dr. Luka Kovač, the hospital’s Chief of Emergency Medicine, and Dr. Abby Lockhart, a second-year resident, returns on track as the couple deal with her unexpected pregnancy. It also focuses on intra-departmental politics caused by the appointment of a new nurse manager, Dr. Greg Pratt’s journey to Africa for a relief mission, a triumphant operation leading to Dr. Kerry Weaver not needing her cane anymore, and a subtle commentary on the Iraq War.

Season 12 sees most of the main cast reprising their respective roles, including Goran Visnjic as Dr. Luka Kovač, Maura Tierney as Dr. Abby Lockhart, Mekhi Phifer as Dr. Greg Pratt, Parminder Nagra as Dr. Neela Rasgotra, Linda Cardellini as Nurse Samantha Taggart, Shane West as Dr. Ray Barnett, Scott Grimes as Dr. Archie Morris, and Laura Innes as Dr. Kerry Weaver.

Watch ER Season 12 streaming via Hulu

ER Season 12 is available to watch on Hulu. With its expansive collection of shows to choose from and the option to stream, download, and upgrade as necessary, Hulu is considered one of the leaders in the industry.

You can watch via Hulu by following these steps:

Go to Hulu.com/welcome

Select ‘Start Your Free Trial’

Choose a plan:

$7.99 per month or $79.99 per year (With Ads)

$17.99 per month (No Ads)

Hulu (With Ads) is the cheapest option, providing users access to Hulu’s streaming library with commercials. Hulu (No Ads) is the service’s premium option, providing access to its library without any advertisements. There are also several bundles available with Hulu that pair the service with Disney Plus and ESPN Plus, along with Live TV plans that also include many live TV channels.

Watch ER Season 12 streaming via HBO Max

ER Season 12 is available to watch on HBO Max. With a massive collection of crime documentaries, classic TV series, contemporary blockbusters, and many more, HBO Max or Max is the go-to choice for many OTT platform subscribers.

You can watch via Max, formerly known as HBO Max by following these steps:

Go to HBOMax.com/subscribe

Click ‘Sign Up Now’

Choose your plan:

$9.99 per month or $99.99 per year (with ads)

$15.99 per month or $149.99 per year (ad-free)

$19.99 per month or $199.99 per year (ultimate ad-free)

Enter your personal information and password

Select ‘Create Account’

Max With Ads provides the service’s streaming library at a Full HD resolution, allowing users to stream on up to two supported devices at once. Max Ad-Free removes the service’s commercials and allows streaming on two devices at once in Full HD. It also allows for 30 downloads at a time to allow users to watch content offline. On the other hand, Max Ultimate Ad-Free allows users to stream on four devices at once in a 4K Ultra HD resolution and provides Dolby Atmos audio and 100 downloads.

ER Season 12 synopsis is as follows:

“ER explores the inner workings of an urban teaching hospital and the critical issues faced by the dedicated physicians and staff of its overburdened emergency room.”

NOTE: The streaming services listed above are subject to change. The information provided was correct at the time of writing.
